snippet: Sarah Attar, one of the first female athletes to compete for Saudi Arabia at the Olympics, was born and raised in California and has dual citizenship.
abstract: Profile of Sarah Attar, one of the first female athletes to compete for Saudi Arabia at the Olympics; she was born and raised in California and has dual citizenship; she will compete in the 800 meters track event in London.
lead_paragraph: Sarah Attar, one of the first female athletes to compete for Saudi Arabia at the Olympics, was born and raised in California and has dual citizenship.

headline.seo: Sarah Attar Is a Saudi Arabian Trailblazer, By Way of the U.S.
headline.main: Saudi Arabian Trailblazer, by Way of United States
headline.print_headline: Path of Saudi Arabian Trailblazer Runs Through the United States
